scripts.build: bun run build:shared && bun run build:client && bun run build:server
scripts.copy:static: mkdir -p build && rm -rf build/static && cp -r client/dist build/static
scripts.build:single: bun run build && bun build ./server/src/index.ts --target=node --outfile=./build/server.js --packages bundle --env=inline && bun run copy:static
scripts.postinstall: bun run build:shared && bun run build:server
scripts.lint: sh -c 'cd client && bun run lint && cd ../server && bun run lint && cd ../shared && bun run lint'
scripts.test: bun run test:server && bun run test:client && bun run test:shared
